toolBar module¶

class toolBar.ToolBar(title)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QToolBar

This class controls the configuration of the application’s tool bar.

addAction(action)¶

Add an action to the tool bar. :param action: The action to add.

class toolBar.ToolButton¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QToolButton

ToolBar companion class which ensures all buttons have the same size.

minSize = (60, 60)¶
minimumSizeHint()¶
Returns:The minimum size of the buttons.

toolBar.hex(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
toolBar.oct(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
